duties_responsibilities.duty: Enforce and monitor adherence to health and safety policies, ensuring all safety credentials are maintained.
Conduct daily safety and health inspections and maintain a written log of identified hazards and corrective actions.
Attend pre-construction and pre-work safety conferences, as well as periodic in-progress meetings.
Implement and enforce accepted APPS and AHAs to maintain safety standards.
Maintain a safety and health deficiency tracking system to monitor outstanding deficiencies until resolved.
Ensure subcontractor compliance with safety and health requirements.
Conduct mishap investigations, complete required reports, and maintain the OSHA Form 300 for Prime Contractor.
Lead weekly safety meetings and develop relevant safety procedures.
Recognize when safety conditions need improvement and prioritize tasks during accidents or incidents.

education_certification.credential: OSHA 30 Hour, First Aid CPR, 5+ years of construction safety experience on data centers
